channel.title: Rmd on Testing Hugodown Things
channel.description: Recent content in Rmd on Testing Hugodown Things

item.title: Hugodown Rmd
item.description: Plain markdown post blogdown .Rmarkdown post Code knitr::opts_chunk$set( fig.path = "plots/", # for leaf bundles to work nicely cache = TRUE, cache.path = "post_cache/", # (for leaf bundles, cache in post directory) fig.retina = 2, fig.width = 8.5, echo = TRUE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, error = FALSE, fig.align = "center", out.width = "95%" ) This is a test of {{< pkg “hugodown” >}}.
